title: 21 I am coming to the cross

lines: I am coming to the cross, I am poor, and weak, and blind;
I am counting all but dross, I shall full salvation find.
I am trusting, Lord, in thee
Humbly at thy cross I bow
Save me Jesus, save me now.
Long my heart has sighed for thee, long has evil reigned within?
Jesus sweetly speak to me, “I will cleanse you from all sin”
Here I give all to thee, friends and time and earthly store;
Soul and body thine to be, wholly thine for ever more.
In thy promises I trust, Now I feel the blood applied;
I am ev`ry whit made whole; Glory, glory to the Lamb
